job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtSite Reliability Engineer  Unicorn startup w RevenueltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Adam BennettltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere a software company that has built a PaaS product that enables large enterprises to automate business decisions We have a long list of current clients and have a line out the door of companies who want to integrate our platform into their supply chain inventory sales and operation applicationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtWere at an inflection point Were scaling our teams and potentially doubling our company in size Were currently over 300 people We have a culturefirst organization and the leader of the DevOps  SRE team wants to see everyone succeed Were looking for engineers to help us scale Were an AWS Azure shop and rely heavily on Kubernetes for scaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMust have Senior experience with deploying and maintaining KubernetesltbrgtltbrgtIdeally you have Sr level experience with a scripting language to scale infrastructureltbrgtltbrgtSenior experience supporting cloud applications in AWS or AzureltbrgtltbrgtMonitoring applications are a really big nice to haveltbrgtltbrgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
